head.text: The Nasa's Perseverance rover has went through the main tests, has deployed the mars helicopter, and it's ready to explore!

content.d2: The Mars Helicopter went through it's starter test flights, and as of now, has managed to pull off 7 flights. You can learn more about the helicopter usingp1
content.d5: If you want to learn more about the Perseverance rover, you can do so, by followingp1
